parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create and assign item to the correct slot. If there is an item in the targeted slot, it gets replaced.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''linkItem''' item

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> item: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>bluforUnit [[linkItem]] "NVGoggles";
opforUnit [[linkItem]] "NVGoggles_OPFOR";
independentUnit [[linkItem]] "NVGoggles_INDEP";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[unlinkItem]], [[addItem]], [[assignItem]], [[removeItem]], [[unassignItem]], [[assignedItems]], [[removeAllAssignedItems]]
</value></part></template></root>
